resources.string: You can add your LPG connection now!!
Just click on Add button below
Enter best-guess expiry time in days
Click on this image to select latest booked date for your LPG connection
is half done. Click to book your cylinder
You can add a new LPG connection details here. Make sure you give the right phone numbers for your LPG Dealer / Distributor, which will come in handy when you try to refill.
You can edit your LPG Booking details below.
Please add a new cylinder connection
You can book for your lpg cylinder refill through call or sms option.
Sure!! You can book re-fill offline by your choice, and provide last booked date in Edit Connections screen from Home page
There seems to be an issue with your connection details. Please try again later or create a new connection
SMS booking facility available only for Indane(IOCL), Bharath Gas(BPCL) and HP Gas(HP Gas).
SMS sent. Please check with distributor for successful booking and change last booked date accordingly.
Hope you had booked your cylinder. Shall we start tracking it then? Click on No if you have not booked, and you can try again later.
Unable to update, please edit last booking date in Edit Connection Page
Unable to retrieve DB, please edit last booking date in Edit Connection Page
Great!! We have successfully started tracking your new booking. We will keep you updated about time to book refill for this cylinder!!
Never mind!! We will inform you to book this cylinder again in a day\'s time
could not be booked in your last attempt. You can try booking it now!!!
Well, you would need to provide permission to us to send and read text messages. Currently, this is not provided. Please let us know if you can provide the access now.
Well, you would need to provide permission to us to call your cooking gas agency. Currently, this is not provided. Please let us know if you can provide the access now.
You can revoke the permission anytime from Settings
